css: .team1 a{color:#e03a3c;text-decoration:none;transition:.3s}.team1 a:hover{color:color-mix(in srgb,#e03a3c,transparent 25%);text-decoration:none}.team1 h2,.team1 h3,.team1 h4,.team1 h5,.team1 h6{color:#fff}@keyframes php-email-form-loading{0%{transform:rotate(0)}100%{transform:rotate(360deg)}}@keyframes pulsate-play-btn{0%{transform:scale(.6,.6);opacity:1}100%{transform:scale(1,1);opacity:0}}@media screen and (max-width:768px){[data-aos-delay]{transition-delay:0!important}}.team1.section,.team1.section-bg{color:#fff;background-color:#1b1b1b;padding:160px 0;scroll-margin-top:100px;overflow:clip}.team1.section-bg{background-color:transparent;padding:160px 0;position:relative}.team1.section-bg:before{content:"";background-color:#000;position:absolute;bottom:60px;top:60px;left:0;right:0;transform:skewY(-3deg)}.team1.section-bg .container{position:relative}@media (max-width:1199px){.team1.section{scroll-margin-top:66px}}.team1 .section-title{text-align:center;padding-bottom:60px;position:relative}.team1 .section-title h2{font-size:32px;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:20px;padding-bottom:20px;position:relative;text-transform:uppercase}.section-title h2:after{content:"";position:absolute;display:block;width:50px;height:3px;background:#e03a3c;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}.section-title p{margin-bottom:0}.team1 .team-member{overflow:hidden;border-radius:5px;box-shadow:0 2px 15px rgba(0,0,0,.1);height:100%}.team1 .team-member .member-img{position:relative;overflow:hidden}.team1 .team-member .social{position:absolute;left:0;bottom:30px;right:0;opacity:0;transition:ease-in-out .3s;text-align:center}.team1 .team-member .social a{background:color-mix(in srgb,#fff,transparent 25%);color:color-mix(in srgb,#444,transparent 20%);margin:0 3px;border-radius:4px;width:36px;height:36px;transition:ease-in-out .3s;display:inline-flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.team1 .team-member .social a:hover{color:#fff;background:#e03a3c}.team1 .team-member .social i{font-size:18px;line-height:0}.team1 .team-member .member-info{padding:25px 15px; background-color: #1b1b1b}.team1 .team-member .member-info h4{font-weight:700;margin-bottom:5px;font-size:18px}.team1 .team-member .member-info span{display:block;font-size:13px;font-weight:400;color:#fff}.team1 .team-member:hover .social{opacity:1;bottom:15px}
